code: /**  * Method is called during the creation of a validator endpoint.  *  * @param camelContext camel context  * @param rootResourceUri resource URI specified in the endpoint URI  * @return resource resolver  */ LSResourceResolver createResourceResolver(CamelContext camelContext, String rootResourceUri).
